description:
Scranton PA's Dr. Slothclaw returns to The Station, hot off of the their smoking Harvest Jam main stage set at Eddy Ridge Farm that had the whole crowd buzzing. Boston's Strange Machines is a melting pot of musical fusion, with sounds catering to heavy rock, funk, livetronica. Rochester's Pine Needle Soul opens it up early at 9pm to celebrate Noah's (MC of PNS) 24th birthday. 
$10 at the door - 21+
name: Dr. Slothclaw w/ Pine Needle Soul and Strange Machines
